import { useState } from "react"; import { FaUser } from "react-icons/fa"; export default () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(true); function handlerClass() { let bo = document.getElementsByTagName("body"); if (value) { bo[0].classList.add("user-open"); bo[0].classList.remove("search-open"); } else { bo[0].classList.remove("user-open"); } setValue(!value); } return ( <> handlerClass()} > perm_identity expand_more

); };
